original_text: Some of them died when people killed them with stones. Some of them died when people cut them into two pieces. Some of them died when people killed them with swords. Some of these people wore the skins of sheep and goats while they travelled about. They were very poor and they had a lot of trouble. People did bad things to them.
korean_text: 돌로 치는 것과 톱으로 켜는 것과 시험과 칼로 죽임을 당하고 양과 염소의 가죽을 입고 유리하여 궁핍과 환난과 학대를 받았으니

sentences.original_text: when people killed them with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 돌로 그들을 쳐 죽였을 때

sentences.original_text: when people cut them into two pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그들을 두 조각으로 잘랐을 때

sentences.original_text: when people killed them with swords
wore the skins of sheep and goats
and they had a lot of trouble
People did bad things to them
